import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (

About VoiceBridge

Our Mission

VoiceBridge is designed to break down language barriers by providing real-time speech recognition and translation capabilities. Our goal is to make communication across different languages seamless and accessible to everyone.

Features

  • Real-time speech recognition
  • Automatic language detection
  • Instant translation to multiple languages
  • User-friendly interface
  • Dark mode support
  • Responsive design for all devices

Technology Stack

Frontend

  • React
  • TailwindCSS
  • React Router

Backend

  • FastAPI
  • Python
  • Uvicorn

APIs

  • Speech Recognition
  • Language Translation
); }; export default About;
